import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookCard=_ref=>{let{book}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const cardStyle={border:'1px solid #ccc',borderRadius:'10px',padding:'10px',margin:'10px',textAlign:'center',backgroundColor:'#444',color:'white',width:'350px',boxShadow:'0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'};const imageStyle={width:'330px',height:'500px',objectFit:'cover',borderRadius:'5px'};const titleStyle={fontSize:'1rem',margin:'10px 0',color:'white',cursor:'pointer'// Add cursor to indicate clickability
